com.m3rcuriel.controve

Class Controve

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.m3rcuriel.controve.Controve

  • public class Controve
extends java.lang.Object
    Access point for higher-level Controve functionality. This class can be used within robot code or unit tests.

    Created by Lee Mracek on 12/10/15.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Controve.Configurator

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static void start()
        Start the core Controve functionality. This does nothing if Controve has already been started. This is useful to call in IterativeRobot.robotInit() to start Controve and being recording events.
        See Also:
        restart()

      • restart

        public static void restart()
        Ensure that Controve is started and, it if was already running, refresh all commands.

        This would be used in IterativeRobot.teleopInit() to ensure that Controve is running as well as to cancel autonomous executors.

        See Also:
        start()

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()

      • timeSystem

        public static Clock timeSystem()
        Get the currently used timer for Controve internal actions.
        Returns:
        Controve's time system; never null
        See Also:
        Controve.Configurator.useFpgaTime(), Controve.Configurator.useSystemTime(), Controve.Configurator.useCustomTime(Clock)

      • excessiveExecutionTimeCounts

        public static long excessiveExecutionTimeCounts()
        Fetch the currently counted times when the main Conductor has taken an excessive amount of time to execute a loop.
        Returns:
        the number of excessive executions

      • generateConductor

        public static com.m3rcuriel.controve.Conductor generateConductor(java.lang.String name,
                                                                 com.m3rcuriel.controve.Executables executables,
                                                                 long periodInNanos)
        Generates Conductor for a given Executables instance for a given period.

        Uses system time.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Conductor
        executables - the Executables to iterate over. Must not be null.
        periodInNanos - the period to loop
        Returns:
        the generated Conductor

      • configure

        public static Controve.Configurator configure()
